summary: Finkle's Lava Dredger is based upon an item found in the Molten Core raid of World of Warcraft. This comes in both 2k and 4k versions and is purely for fun.
descriptionHtml:
[center][url=http://www.facebook.com/johnskyrim][/url][/center][center][url=http://www.facebook.com/johnskyrim][img]http://i.imgur.com/SkMFU4n.png[/img][/url] 
[youtube]WgZfVo1_0Bg[/youtube]  

[img]http://i.imgur.com/hFJD2jt.jpg[/img][/center][b][color=#00ffff][center]This is an ANIMATED weapon![/center][/color][/b]
[b]About:[/b]

Finkle's Lava Dredger is based upon on an found in the Molten Core raid of World of Warcraft. This mod was the result of experimenting with animated weapons. It was a [b][u]fun[/u][/b] project and the quickest mod I've ever made, so I thought I should release it rather than just leave it on my HDD. Maybe somebody might like the lore-friendly-unfriendliness of it :)

This version has 2k textures & 4k textures.

[b][color=#ffff00]What this mod includes:[/color][/b] Finkle's Lava Dredger (Dwarven Two-handed Warhammer) which has a base attack of 20. It is clean from enchantments so that you can add your own.

[color=#ff0000][b][center]Do NOT optimize the textures! Some maps are purposely uncompressed![/center][/b][/color][img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]

[b]Obtaining:[/b]

You will need to travel to Liar's Retreat (North-East of Karthwasten or South-West from Solitude)Inside you will need to kill little [b]Finkle Einhorn[/b], as well as any Falmer that are in your way. (it's really not hard!)

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]

[b]Installation:[/b]

Use Nexus Mod Manager

or

Extract the downloaded archive into your Skyrim Data Folder.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]

[b]Uninstall Instructions:[/b]

Remove using Nexus Mod Manager

or

Simply delete the following files:

Finkles Lava Dredger - Johnskyrim.esp
Finkles Lava Dredger - Johnskyrim.bsa

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]

[b]Questions:[/b]

Q. What did you use to create this mod?
A. 3ds Max, Zbrush and Photoshop.

Q. What mods are you working on?
A. Those are posted on my [url=http://www.facebook.com/johnskyrim]facebook[/url] page!

Q. What ENB do you use?
A. Modified True Vision + True Vision Weather Beta 

Now back to more serious projects!

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]

[b]Known Issues:[/b]

- Not serious enough

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]

If for some reason the files do not work, cause crashes
or any other problems, please do not hesitate to contact me.

All screenshots are taken directly from the game and resized down from 1920x1080 to 1280x720. No other editing has been done.

Thanks and I hope you enjoy this Skyrim Mod!

PS. DO NOT UPLOAD THIS FILE ANYWHERE ELSE!

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]
